Package com.group26.node.packet.formats

Class PingPongPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group26.node.packet.formats.PingPongPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkPacket
    public class PingPongPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkPacket
    Packet that is used to ping the nearest nodes to identify the ones that are located within the transmission range of the current node.
